item.title: Create your own future
item.description: SPOILER ALERT: This blogpost is based on the book Lessons In Chemistry and contains spoilers. Elizabeth Zott hated being in class, sitting at a desk, listening to monotonous teachers talking about boring subjects. It wasn’t that she didn’t enjoy learning. She loved it. But all learning there was based on memorization, and Elizabeth liked creativity. Elizabeth also disliked her classmates, with whom they shared no hobbies. And all that made her suffer.
